title: ascent ^vtk-h@0.7.1 build fails: undefined ref vtkh::lodepng_encode_memory
body:
`ascent@0.7.0` build fails when using `vtk-h@0.7.1` using:
* `spack@develop` (7febe23ebcb33932661b6736be87969e465f867e from `Wed May 19 14:05:24 2021 -0700`)
* Ubuntu 20.04 GCC 9.3.0
* Ubuntu 18.04 GCC 7.5.0
* RHEL 7 GCC 9.3.0
* RHEL 8 GCC 8.3.1

Concrete spec: [ascent.spec.yaml.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6511704/ascent.spec.yaml.txt)
Build log: [ascent-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6511708/ascent-build-out.txt)

Reproduced using Docker container image `ecpe4s/ubuntu20.04-runner-x86_64:2021-05-15`
```
$> git clone https://github.com/spack/spack
$> (cd spack && git checkout 7febe23ebc)

$> spack mirror add E4S https://cache.e4s.io
$> spack buildcache keys -it
OK

$> spack install --cache-only --only dependencies --include-build-deps -f ./ascent.spec.yaml
OK

$> spack install --no-cache -f ./ascent.spec.yaml
...
==> Installing ascent-0.7.0-7tfsjefpla26znb6zil3sexh7qbazkai
==> No patches needed for ascent
==> ascent: Executing phase: 'install'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j16'
```
